name: get-upload-policy
description: This Lambda function will generate and return a policy to allow users to upload files to S3

scripts.create: aws lambda create-function --function-name get-upload-policy --handler index.handler --memory-size 128 --runtime nodejs4.3 --role arn:aws:iam::038221756127:role/lambda-s3-execution-role --timeout 3 --publish --zip-file fileb://Lambda-Deployment.zip

author: Peter Sbarski
